def_cn: (包括说话者或笔者在内的)我们
def_en: A speaker or writer uses we to refer both to himself or herself and to one or more other people as a group. You can use we before a noun to make it clear which group of people you are referring to.
We is sometimes used to refer to people in general.

def_cn: (不仅指自己也指听者或读者)我们
def_en: A speaker or writer may use we instead of 'I' in order to include the audience or reader in what they are saying, especially when discussing how a talk or book is organized.
